reviews.title: better than anticipated
reviews.text: My mother and sisters and I were looking for a place to stay in Corona after spending the day at Glen Ivy Hot Springs. Dynasty Suites is listed on the Glen Ivy web site as one of the hotels in the area. We booked a two bedroom suite and expected it to have a living room area in addition to 2 bedrooms but the door opened into a room with a king size bed, large desk, small table & chairs and armoire with TV. A second bedroom held another king size bed and access to the bathroom. Big points for the mattress being the best hotel mattress I've slept on and the bath towels were very thick and absorbent. Breakfast in the morning had fresh made-to-order waffles and a variety of cereals, bagels, fruit, etc. The hotel also offered complimentary cocktail coupons for the nearby Cask & Cleaver restaurant which we used at dinner. We would stay here again.

reviews.title: Perfect family set up
reviews.text: Stayed here January 2, 2004, had their 3 bed family suite, just perfect for 2 adults and 3 kids. Hotel offers a wonderful breakfast! Juice, coffee, hot chocolate, danish, toast, muffins, hot and cold cereal, fresh fruit, a real breakfast. This was a great value.

If you are stuck in Corona for any reason (sorry locals) you should stay at the Hotel Paseo. I can't say enough good things about this little hotel. Awesome staff for one. I checked in and told the front desk that I was giving up my Hilton points to stay here and they upgraded my room for free. When you arrive they have hot chocolate, tea, coffee, brownies, cookies, soda, water, fruit, all for you in the lobby. They also have this great little lounge area thats open 24/hours a day with a huge Samsung Touch of Color LCD. The beds are AMAZING! Bath and body works products in the bathroom. Tons of extras in the bathroom such as toothpaste, toothbrush, etc... Loved this hotel for the price, only wish my work would have booked me the jacuzzi suite :) It looks too cool!
reviews.title: This place is so awesome!

likes.liked: — bed, staff, lobby area, decor, parking, freeway access, bath products

reviews.text: TIP- Blowdryer is in ironing board cabinet.
reviews.title: Great Service

likes.liked: — Service and great towels, beds and bedding. Microwave and refrigerator
likes.disliked: — NO public computer to check email and print boarding passes

reviews.title: Very nice in a not so nice area
It was Great until the PIPES GOT BACKED UP.....
reviews.text: Luxury beds, bedding and towels. Complimentary waters, sodas, and snacks. Great breakfast.

reviews.title: This Hotel is Awesome!!!!
reviews.text: Only downside is that it is located in an older area of Corona. There is a Mexican restaurant, Denny's and Carl's Junior within walking distance, but we had to drive for more and better restaurant choices.
